website_summaries.verdict: Keep that sunshine out of your eyes with these fantastic Michael Kors aviators that feature a metal frame, rose gold details, and blue mirrored lenses.
pros: Blue, reflective lenses are beautiful and unique
cons: More expensive than other aviator models

customer_reviews.title: Blue lens!
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are awesome! I’ve been blessed to have many designer sunglasses over the years and this pair is my absolute favorite! I love the blue lenses and the white, gold tone frame. The shape of the lens is what I love most. There not to long to hit my cheeks when I smile or talk. The arms don’t curve down too much around the ear, so no discomfort after hours of wear. The case is nice sized to keep in your handbag. I also need to mention, the lens color does not distract your vision to see clearly, drive ect. I will be rocking the beach all summer in these beauties
customer_reviews.author: Donna C.

customer_reviews.title: Love my sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Sunglasses came in quicker than expected and were exactly what I wanted, I had my first pair stolen at a Denny’s and was devastated bc the shop I got them from back in November no longer had this style so I turned to amazon and found these babies and they are exactly like my old ones! Thank you so much amazon and potato company!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah90

customer_reviews.title: My 3rd pair
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these same glasses several times because they are stylish and classic. I always get compliments. The only reason I've had to replace them is that the lenses have gotten small shatters in them - not broken, just thin little shatters that are really only noticeable up close. But I like them enough to replace them!
customer_reviews.author: Zophisticated Dove

customer_reviews.title: I cannot say enough great things about these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough great things about these glasses!! I was apprehensive about ordering online, but I loved the way these looked, so I took a chance. They’re lightweight, stylish, and come with a nice case and cleaning cloth. I highly recommend them!!
customer_reviews.author: Beach Bum

customer_reviews.title: They were very sharp looking and the person who I gave them to absolutely loved the glasses
customer_reviews.text: I gave these sunglasses as a Christmas gift. They were very sharp looking and the person who I gave them to absolutely loved the glasses! The customer service from Potato Eyewear was very responsive. They send multiple preemptive emails to inform me the shipment was on the way and asked what I thought. Very good transaction and happy about the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: I get many compliments
customer_reviews.text: Saw these @ sunglasses hut, I had to have them. Instead of impulse buying I decided to search amazon for the same product, same sunglasses for 50$ cheaper on amazon... I immediately bought them. They have become my favorite sunglasses for the summer!!! Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sunglasses ever
customer_reviews.text: A gift from my husband I love. These are unique in color and is what attracts me the most to them. They have a surprisingly great sun protection elements. I can see even in the brightest of sunshine and my vision is not disturbed by the color. Even in bright sunlight these sunglasses are the best I have had thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Martel and Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Polarized Or Not??
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks of these and I purchased after seeing one review that indicates they are polarized. Now I'm not sure. As an avid boater and Floridian, I need polarized glasses. I can use them for sunset cruises at least. Probably won't wear them during the daytime.
customer_reviews.author: LaurieD

customer_reviews.title: Stylish sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: My wife has super sensitive eyes. She loves the way the glasses cover her eyes and block all of the sunlight. She wears them all of the time and gets lots of compliments. I thought they would be too big for her but they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: brad richardson

customer_reviews.title: ... my daughter arrived quickly and she is going to love them!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter arrived quickly and she is going to love them!! Also comes with a lovely MK protective case. Very happy with my order!
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sunglasses. Accurate to description
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Had a pair from sunglass hut. Paid 140 aaaaaand my dog ate them. Found these. I don't know of theyre legit but theyre identical!
customer_reviews.author: Spharo

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are perfect for my type of face! I love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. As I am Chinese...I have a flatter nose than most people. So, whenever I wear these types of glasses, the bottom of the lenses always sit and rub on my face. These particular glasses have nose pieces which sit on my nose far enough down, that they keep the glasses supported above my face, thereby allowing them to remain clean all the time and not be smeared with skin oils or make up.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Chow

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. Was nervous about the blue but they look great. And came faster than excepted because they were on back order.
customer_reviews.author: Lupe Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my wife. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Momchil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my sunglasses and thanks for getting them here so QUICKLY!!
customer_reviews.author: Marshalindsey

customer_reviews.title: They are SO CUTE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted... these sunglasses are the real thing and they feel absolutely amazing on... I get so many compliments and they are absolutely are so beautiful. REALLY FAST DELIVERY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I believe It can be worn by both the sexes
customer_reviews.text: Though it says that it is for women, I believe it can be worn by both the sexes. The shape is close to an aviator one and looks beautiful. It enhances your look , glass and frame quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Dipankar

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic service; super quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great: from the price to ordering to the super quick delivery less than a werk before Christmas to my daughter LOVING her new Kors sunglasses. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TerBear

customer_reviews.title: Cool!!!
customer_reviews.text: This glasses looks so nice! Also it can make me look clearly when I'm in the sunshine.So cool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy fram high quality lens.
customer_reviews.text: I love these sun glasses only down fall was the nose piece being very small. They just didn’t sit right on my nose. Seeing I’ve already paid for them I’m just going to make them work.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about these glasses! I only wish it came with a cloth bag cover to put inside the case. Blue mirror lenses are gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Muschong

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. They’re so beautiful, the lenses provide the perfect amount of protection for my eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Revere

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Thinking of getting my daughter a pair !!
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Fake...
customer_reviews.text: They are fake..(Made in China).. instead on Italy but wife is happy..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much, I bought two pair. High quality, well made, super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Angela Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are everything I wanted. Great fit. Love the blue shades!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These are the exact beautiful ocean blue sunglasses I lost on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Jyskates

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are real for 1/2 the price of the Michael Kor’s store
customer_reviews.author: Isha Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses are stylish and lightweight, they also fit very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I've recieved nothing but compliments and questions about where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Leon P. Leak

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: I get tons of compliments on these, and they fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: They are gorgeous! The real deal! Came fast and was delivered in a nice Michael Kors sun glass case!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Crow

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves these sunglasses... so much ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these sunglasses...so much so that I have replaced them twice after the first two pair got scratched.
customer_reviews.author: E&K

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses and have received a lot of compliments
customer_reviews.author: Debra Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Super cute, fit well and very fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sunglasses...
customer_reviews.text: Love my sunglasses!!! Sunglass hut had the same glasses for $130. Super bargain and will definitely buy from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needless to say my lady was happy.
customer_reviews.text: I got exactly what Was shown and listed and got it a day early. Needless to say my lady was happy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I got them in and they were completely scratched up. I couldn't even see through the lens.
customer_reviews.author: Sheridan ramer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice pair of sunglasses, I bought them for my wife and she loves them
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Quintanar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the look of these glasses, also checked to make sure it was authentic and it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best sunglasses I’ve ever owned so far! I usually don’t spend a lot on sunglasses but my husband got these for me for Xmas and I LOVE them! Great coverage blocking sunlight and the blue reflective lens are super cool. Plus the price was great considering there about 1/3 more on Michael kors website.
customer_reviews.author: Wendolyn Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife Loves theses Awesome shades not a bad price ether
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
